
                            
                            <p>打开“中国工商银行”APP搜索【任务中心】进去，下拉页面在享活动那里点【智慧金融体验日】完成3个简单的浏览任务可以抽奖3次，非必中<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/03/085825qsoy14oflonlkxfc.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/03/085825qsoy14oflonlkxfc.png"> <br> </p>
